channel.title: Why did you guys get into cheating and when?
channel.description:
Why: I never used a cheat before, but now I'm learning some programming language, in an attempt to contribute back to this community.I got into this actually for private servers, but now I think I can safely say that I have grown out of that noob environment.
When: In a sense, I only started about 2-4 months ago, that was when I got interested in cheating.
How about you guys?

item.title: Why did you guys get into cheating and when?
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:24, topic:13271”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=19748.msg225477#msg225477 date=1157698844]
2000.
[/quote] how and why? ;D[/quote]

How- I just heard about a few people trying it out, nothing special
Why- Becuase I felt like it

Read full topic

I came around about 2 years ago I think. Well maybe not that long ago, because when I came SCAR 2.02 or .03 was out, but people still used 1.13 for some scripts. I joined for runescpae cheats, DUH! I never really used one at all though.

item.title: Why did you guys get into cheating and when?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Well, I’ve been playing Runescape since 2001. I read Cows Black Book and joined RSCN was a noob on a few old cheating forums. I don’t really remember much of what I said, but I’m guessing it was stupid, I ran a few SCAR scripts then, but I really only pked anyway so I didn’t use them. I joined Kaitnieks.com and that’s when I really became interested in java and learning to make cheats.

Read full topic

item.title: Why did you guys get into cheating and when?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

WHY: umm I got really bored with training stats and stuff.

WHEN: Umm, the first actually script i ran was a powerminer in SBOT for RSC and then i started to make my own scripts for sbot, i then quit cheating and runescape for a while and got back into it around when private servers came out…

Read full topic
item.source: Why did you guys get into cheating and when?

item.title: Why did you guys get into cheating and when?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I realised picking flax WAS actually wasting my time I searched the internet for Autoers and found Kaitnieks. Leeched off there for a while (:P), then the ban came along. All of my accounts survived. Then Kaitnieks died and I, ashamed to say, went to www.autoruneltd.co.uk. Wasted a few months there (Knowing it was a scam and refusing to buy the “bot”.) I then came accross here. Used Aryan still until it died. Only ever got 2-3 accounts banned <3

This all started about Christmas time '05.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

errr, depends whether you count serious cheating or not ;D

in any case, i started in the days of nick’s autominer was going strong (i may still have it… chances are i dont though) then gave up for ages… when i came back i started client hacking (around 2-3 years ago before rsc cheating was out of control)

why you ask? why would someone waste so much time on a repetitive game xD
